lines.text: function check which takes integer arguments i and j and returns integer
lines.code: int check ( int i , int j )

lines.text: else if i is equal to 2
let a be an array of integers of length 3
if s is equal to " rock " a [ i ] = 1
if s is equal to " scissors " a [ i ] = 2
if s is equal to " paper " a [ i ] = 3
if check ( a [ 0 ] , a [ 1 ] ) and check ( a [ 0 ] , a [ 2 ] ) are both true
lines.code: if ( check ( a [ 0 ] , a [ 1 ] ) && check ( a [ 0 ] , a [ 2 ] ) )

lines.text: print " F " and a new line
else if check ( a [ 1 ] , a [ 0 ] ) and check ( a [ 1 ] , a [ 2 ] ) are both true

lines.text: print " M " and a new line
